short_summary: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) needs bag gym nylon.
description: The RCMP has a requirement for bag gym nylon in accordance with the RCMP Specification G.S.1045-182 dated 2022-11-29 and the viewing samples.   This procurement request includes options to order additional quantities during a period of 36 months from contract award.   All deliverables are to be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario.
full_summary:
=================================
### Tender Announcement

**Notice #**: WS4092283575-Doc4364949646

**Amended Notice #**: 4
**Publication Date**: December 21, 2023
**Closing Date**: February 7, 2024, 2:00:00 PM EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting proposals from qualified suppliers to provide Gym Bags that meet the requirements of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP).

**Scope of Work:**

* Supply Gym Bags that meet the RCMP Specification G.S.1045-182 dated  November 29, 2022, and viewing samples.
* Deliver all products to Ottawa, Ontario.
* The contract will include options to order additional quantities during a period of 36 months from contract award.

**Key Information:**

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Region of Opportunity: Ottawa, Ontario

**Contact Information:**

* Mathieu Hevey (SPAC/PSPC)
* Phone: [None]
* Email: [mathieu.hevey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mathieu.hevey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Documents and Information:**

* The RFP document is available for download at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18344128?extsite=MTgzNDQxMjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18344128?extsite=MTgzNDQxMjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* For inquiries, please contact Mathieu Hevey at the provided email address.
